page_content: Discusses the requirements and procedures for municipalities to receive land registry notifications via eCH-0134 compatible software.
Provides forms and information for registering or modifying a sole proprietorship in the Canton of Aargau.
Provides a comprehensive FAQ about ePlanung, a digital service for spatial planning in the Canton of Aargau.
Discusses the health benefits of spending time in the forest and promotes the Mein Waldschatz initiative for mental well-being.
Discusses the current flood situation in the Canton of Aargau and the measures being taken to manage it.
Outlines the procedure for offering records to the State Archive of Aargau, including steps for both governmental and private entities.
Discusses the impact of crows on vegetable farming in the Canton of Aargau and outlines a pilot project to manage the issue.
